metadata.title: CVE-2023-43377 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in/hoteldruid/visualizza_contratto.php of Hoteldruid v3.0.5 allows attackersto execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injectedinto the destinatario_email1 parameter.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
